00033 class NVTFile : public ifstream
00034 {
00035         public:
00041                 NVTFile(string filename,Time frameDuration) : filename(filename),frameDuration(frameDuration),nFrames(-1),t(-1),gap(-1),frameN(-1) {};
00045                 NVTFile() : filename(""),frameDuration(-1),nFrames(-1),t(-1),gap(-1),frameN(-1) {};
00049                 virtual ~NVTFile() {};
00055                 virtual void set(string filename,Time frameDuration) { this->filename = filename; this->frameDuration = frameDuration; };
00060                 virtual void open() throw(NLXError);
00064                 virtual void init();
00069                 virtual bool readFrame();
00073                 virtual void writeFrame(ofstream &output);
00078                 virtual void writeLastFrame(ofstream &output);
00083                 virtual long getNFrames() { return nFrames; };
00088                 virtual Time getGap() { return gap; };
00093                 virtual Time getTimestamp() { return t; };
00097                 virtual void showFileHeader();
00098 
00099         private:
00100 
00104                 string          filename;
00108                 char                    fileHeader[NVT_FILE_HEADER_SIZE];
00112                 Time                    frameDuration;
00116                 long                    nFrames;
00120                 Time                    t0;
00124                 Time                    t;
00128                 Time                    gap;
00132                 Coordinates     dwPoints[NVT_N_DWPOINTS],x,y,angle,targets[NVT_N_TARGETS];
00136                 int                     frameN;
00137 };
